Yes. Both are strongman-style leaders. Both are seen to have been """"racist"""" towards a certain race at some point in their career by their political opponents, but both of them talk tough and I'd like to believe Trump will actually put his money and action where his mouth is, the same way LKY did in his lifetime. There are more similarities than differences between Trump and LKY than one would imagine. But in all due respect Trump could do with some Cambridge-style language and debate education.
